attributes.action: Encourage national pride and put British people and culture first no matter what
attributes.additional_details: Britain is a nation like no other we have unique values culture and tradition which as of right now is extremely fragile with less and less people subscribing to British values. Millions of men fought and died for our country so we should not take it for granted.
attributes.background: I ask the government to be more honest with Britain and to not bow down/sell us out to any foreign nation or people as Britain should always come first. And to address the dangers of Islamic extremism and the dangers of sharia law. Most importantly put our culture and country first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
